Package sample.JavaFX.UploadScene

Class UploadSceneController

java.lang.Object
sample.JavaFX.UploadScene.UploadSceneController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class UploadSceneController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
UploadSceneController controls the UploadScene.
Covers all methods needed for the UploadScene.
The class implements Initializable.
The @FXML tells the compiler that this variable is connected to an FXML-file

    • showConfirmationDialog

      public boolean showConfirmationDialog()
      Method that comes up when the ListView with tags is empty and user tries to upload
      Asks user if they are sure they want no tags
      Returns:
      boolean representing yes or no from user
